mapper.insert: insert into cart (num, userid, gcode, gname, gprice, gsize, gcolor, gamount, gimage) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{gcode}, #{gname}, #{gprice}, #{gsize}, #{gcolor}, #{gamount}, #{gimage})
mapper.select: select num, userid, gcode, gname, gprice, gsize, gcolor, gamount, gimage from cart where userid = #{userid}
